I was lucky enough to go into the Portal Series completely blind and I can say it was one hell of a ride. This game is literally one of the most god tier games ever made. The 16 hours I spent playing had been some of the best 16 hours of my life so far. I wish I could play this game for the first time again. Thank you Valve for this masterpiece.

you're now thinking with uhhhhh uuhuummm uuummh

At first I was bored and thought the game wouldn't live up to expectations but slowly as I progressed in the story and I learned more about how the game works this game really started to get in my favourites list, Its gameplay is so unique and even though its 2020 I still think its one of the BEST games you could play today. 

The story rolled me and had really unique and unexpected bits, it had a bunch of humour with the characters and was genuenly fun to play. When I finished it I felt incredibly proud and couldn't beleive that there wasn't a Portal 3, such an amazing franchise needs another entry.
As to level wise, most levels made you think, after some time of trying you'd always find the way and end up face palming. The rare sequences where I ended up having to look up a playthrough to get the answer I also ended up face palming myself because the answer most of the times would be so obvious. As a whole the game was amazing and out of all the games that exist today this one really REALLY stands out. Completely worth the buy.
Great game, love the story and characters.
